[DQC.US.0001.76] The concept PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross with a value of 48,000,000 is dimensionally qualified with the srt:StatementScenarioAxis and the base taxonomy member FutureMember. Only extension members and the elements defined as children of this axis in the US GAAP taxonomy should be used with the axis srt:StatementScenarioAxis. The properties of the fact for PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesGross are: Period: 2023-04-01 to 2023-06-30 Dimensions: us-gaap:BusinessAcquisitionAxis=kmb:ThinxIncMember, srt:StatementScenarioAxis=us-gaap:FutureMember Unit: USD
